department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: no fasteners/closures; straight front opening; rounded collar; eight panels of embroidery on front, five on back and two vertical embroidered panels on each side; side vents; primarily indigo blue backing forming trim; geometric embroidered motifs with stars inside diamonds on front and bottom panels on back; front is primarily green and magenta; back diamonds and stars are primarily blue, magenta and green; top panels on back are pinwheel motifs in bright colors with black and white elements
title: Child's vest
